Gall.name: Shadowflame
Gall.description: Deal 135 (+5% per level) damage to enemies in the area.

Gall.name: Dread Orb
Gall.description: Throw a bomb that will bounce three times, dealing 126 (+5% per level) damage to enemies.

Gall.name: Runic Blast
Gall.description: Detonate Cho's Rune Bomb, dealing 233 (+4% per level) damage around it.

Gall.name: Shadow Bolt Volley
Gall.description: After 1 second, unleash 20 Shadow Bolts over 4 seconds, each dealing 87 (+4% per level) damage to the first target hit. The bolts fire towards your mouse.

Gall.name: Twisting Nether
Gall.description: After 1 second, nearby enemies are slowed by 50% while Gall channels, up to 5 seconds. Activate to deal 353 (+5% per level) damage.

Gall.name: Ogre Rage
Gall.description: Activate to increase Gall's damage by 25%, but reduce Cho's armor by 25.

Gall.name: Shove
Gall.description: Nudge Cho a small distance and grant him 25% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

Gall.name: Eye of Kilrogg
Gall.description: Place an eye, granting vision of a large area around it for 45 seconds. The eye can be killed by enemies with 2 Basic Attacks. Stores up to 2 charges.

1.name: Keep Moving!
1.description: Increases the duration of Shove's movement speed bonus by 1 second. Cho's Basic Attacks against Heroes increases the duration of an active Shove by 1 second.

1.name: Taskmaster
1.description: Reduces the cooldown of Shove by 10 seconds. Every time Cho is hit by a Hero Basic Attack, reduce the Cooldown of Shove by 1 second.

1.name: We See You!
1.description: Eye of Kilrogg's cooldown is decreased by 15 seconds and its range is increased by 33%.

4.name: Bomb's Away
4.description: Quest: Damaging a Hero with Runic Blast increases its damage by 5.  Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes, the range and speed of Cho's Rune Bomb is increased by 20%.

4.name: Double Back
4.description: Activate Dread Orb before the second bounce ends to reverse the direction of the third bounce.  Passive: The third bounce of Dread Orb deals 200% more damage to Non-Heroic targets.

4.name: Runic Persistence
4.description: Runic Blast deals an additional 180 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds in an area around the detonation point.

7.name: Double Trouble
7.description: Quest: If Shadowflame hits an enemy Hero that is afflicted by Cho's Consuming Blaze, its cooldown is reduced by 1 second.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, Shadowflame's cooldown is instead permanently reduced by 1 second.

7.name: Edge of Madness
7.description: Every subsequent hit of Shadowflame against the same enemy Hero deals an additional 8% damage, to a maximum of 40%. These bonuses are lost if the Hero has not been hit for 4 seconds.

7.name: Ogre Rampage
7.description: Gall's Basic Abilities cooldown 75% faster for 5 seconds after Cho activates Ogre Hide.

10.name: Shadow Bolt Volley
10.description: After 1 second, unleash 20 Shadow Bolts over 4 seconds, each dealing 82 (+4% per level) damage to the first target hit. The bolts fire towards your mouse.

10.name: Twisting Nether
10.description: After 1 second, nearby enemies are slowed by 50% while Gall channels, up to 5 seconds. Activate to deal 353 (+5% per level) damage.

13.name: Rising Dread
13.description: Each bounce of Dread Orb increases its radius by 25% and damage by 25%.

13.name: Searing Shadows
13.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Shadowflame take an additional 2% of their maximum Health as damage.

13.name: Twilight Nova
13.description: After the first bounce of Dread Orb, 2 extra bombs bounce to the sides once.

16.name: Deafening Blast
16.description: Runic Blast silences enemy Heroes for 1.25 seconds.

16.name: Leaden Orb
16.description: Dread Orb stuns enemy Heroes for 0.5 seconds.

16.name: Shadowsnare
16.description: Shadowflame slows enemy Heroes by 10% for 4 seconds. This effect can stack up to 3 times.

20.name: Psychotic Break
20.description: Upon dying, Gall gains Ogre Rage and can use Basic and Heroic Abilities for 10 seconds.

20.name: Shadowfury
20.description: Shadow Bolt Volley hits all enemies in its path.

20.name: Shifting Nether
20.description: Twisting Nether now teleports Cho to a targeted location before it begins channeling.

20.name: The Will of Gall
20.description: Takedowns permanently increase the bonus of Ogre Rage by 2%.
